item.name: testItem

var.name: supplier_reg_user_day
var.value: select COUNT(1) supplier_reg_user_day from b2b_user.uuc_user where user_biz_type=1 AND `name` not like 'test%' AND user_id not in ( select i.user_id from b2b_user.uuc_user_identity i inner join b2b_company.uuc_supplier_basic d on i.company_id=d.supplier_id where d.company_name like 'test%' ) AND DATE(register_time) = DATE(NOW())

var.name: supplier_reg_user_total
var.value: select COUNT(1) supplier_reg_user_total from b2b_user.uuc_user where user_biz_type=1 AND `name` not like 'test%' AND user_id not in ( select i.user_id from b2b_user.uuc_user_identity i inner join b2b_company.uuc_supplier_basic d on i.company_id=d.supplier_id where d.company_name like 'test%' )

var.name: supplier_auth_user_day
var.value: select COUNT(1) supplier_auth_user_day from b2b_user.uuc_user u inner join b2b_user.uuc_company_certification_record r on u.user_id=r.user_id inner join b2b_company.uuc_supplier_basic b on r.company_id=b.supplier_id where u.`name` not like 'test%' AND b.company_name not like 'test%' AND r.`status`=1 AND b.`status`=2 AND DATE(r.last_audit_time) = DATE(NOW())

var.name: supplier_auth_user_total
var.value: select COUNT(1) supplier_auth_user_total from b2b_user.uuc_user u inner join b2b_user.uuc_company_certification_record r on u.user_id=r.user_id inner join b2b_company.uuc_supplier_basic b on r.company_id=b.supplier_id where u.`name` not like 'test%' AND b.company_name not like 'test%' AND r.`status`=1 AND b.`status`=2

var.name: developer_reg_user_day
var.value: select COUNT(1) developer_reg_user_day from b2b_user.uuc_user where user_biz_type=2 AND `name` not like 'test%' AND user_id not in (select i.user_id from b2b_user.uuc_user_identity i inner join b2b_company.uuc_developer d on i.company_id=d.developer_id where d.company_name like 'test%') AND DATE(register_time) = DATE(NOW())

var.name: developer_reg_user_total
var.value: select COUNT(1) developer_reg_user_total from b2b_user.uuc_user where user_biz_type=2 AND `name` not like 'test%' AND user_id not in ( select i.user_id from b2b_user.uuc_user_identity i inner join b2b_company.uuc_developer d on i.company_id=d.developer_id where d.company_name like 'test%' )

var.name: developer_sign_company_day
var.value: select COUNT(1) developer_sign_company_day from b2b_company.uuc_developer a inner join b2b_user.uuc_company_contract b on a.developer_id=b.company_id where b.sign_status=1 and a.company_name not like 'test%' AND DATE(b.area_sign_date) like DATE(NOW())

var.name: developer_sign_company_total
var.value: select COUNT(1) developer_sign_company_total from b2b_company.uuc_developer a inner join b2b_user.uuc_company_contract b on a.developer_id=b.company_id where b.sign_status=1 and a.company_name not like 'test%'

var.name: supplier_user_login_times_day
var.value: SELECT COUNT(l.login_log_id) supplier_user_login_times_day FROM b2b_user.uuc_user_login_log l inner join b2b_user.uuc_user u on u.user_id=l.user_id WHERE DATE(l.login_time) = DATE(NOW()) AND u.user_biz_type=1

var.name: supplier_user_login_times_total
var.value: SELECT COUNT(l.login_log_id) supplier_user_login_times_total FROM b2b_user.uuc_user_login_log l inner join b2b_user.uuc_user u on u.user_id=l.user_id WHERE u.user_biz_type=1

var.name: developer_user_login_times_day
var.value: SELECT COUNT(l.login_log_id) developer_user_login_times_day FROM b2b_user.uuc_user_login_log l inner join b2b_user.uuc_user u on u.user_id=l.user_id WHERE DATE(l.login_time) = DATE(NOW()) AND u.user_biz_type=2

var.name: developer_user_login_times_total
var.value: SELECT COUNT(l.login_log_id) developer_user_login_times_total FROM b2b_user.uuc_user_login_log l inner join b2b_user.uuc_user u on u.user_id=l.user_id WHERE u.user_biz_type=2

var.name: publish_recruit_company_day
var.value: SELECT count(distinct company_id) as publish_recruit_company_day FROM b2b_bidding.bid_recruit_item where state=1 and DATE(publish_time)=DATE(NOW())

var.name: publish_recruit_company_total
var.value: SELECT count(distinct company_id) as publish_recruit_company_total FROM b2b_bidding.bid_recruit_item where state=1 and DATE(publish_time)=DATE(NOW())

var.name: publish_recruit_count_day
var.value: SELECT count(1) as publish_recruit_count_day FROM b2b_bidding.bid_recruit_item where state=1 and DATE(publish_time) = DATE(NOW())

var.name: publish_recruit_count_total
var.value: SELECT count(1) as publish_recruit_count_total FROM b2b_bidding.bid_recruit_item where state=1

var.name: recruit_apply_company_day
var.value: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT supplier_id) recruit_apply_company_day FROM b2b_bidding.bid_recruit_item_register WHERE DATE(created_time)=DATE(NOW())

var.name: recruit_apply_company_total
var.value: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT supplier_id) recruit_apply_company_total FROM b2b_bidding.bid_recruit_item_register

var.name: recruit_apply_count_day
var.value: SELECT COUNT(1) recruit_apply_count_day FROM b2b_bidding.bid_recruit_item_register WHERE DATE(created_time)=DATE(NOW())

var.name: recruit_apply_count_total
var.value: SELECT COUNT(1) recruit_apply_count_total FROM b2b_bidding.bid_recruit_item_register

var.name: storage_company_day
var.value: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT supplier_id) storage_company_day FROM b2b_bidding.bid_recruit_item_register WHERE `storage`=1 AND DATE(storage_time)=DATE(NOW())

var.name: storage_company_total
var.value: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT supplier_id) storage_company_total FROM b2b_bidding.bid_recruit_item_register WHERE `storage`=1

var.name: storage_count_day
var.value: SELECT COUNT(1) storage_count_day FROM b2b_bidding.bid_recruit_item_register WHERE `storage`=1 AND DATE(storage_time)=DATE(NOW())

var.name: storage_count_total
var.value: SELECT COUNT(1) storage_count_total FROM b2b_bidding.bid_recruit_item_register WHERE `storage`=1

var.name: publish_bidding_company_day
var.value: SELECT count(distinct developer_uid) as publish_bidding_company_day FROM b2b_bidding.bid_announcements where DATE(created_time)=DATE(NOW())

var.name: publish_bidding_company_total
var.value: SELECT count(distinct developer_uid) as publish_bidding_company_total FROM b2b_bidding.bid_announcements

var.name: publish_bidding_count_day
var.value: SELECT count(1) as publish_bidding_count_day FROM b2b_bidding.bid_announcements where DATE(created_time)=DATE(NOW())

var.name: publish_bidding_count_total
var.value: SELECT count(1) as publish_bidding_count_total FROM b2b_bidding.bid_announcements

var.name: bidding_apply_company_day
var.value: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT supplier_id) bidding_apply_company_day FROM b2b_bidding.bid_announcements_register WHERE DATE(created_time)=DATE(NOW())

var.name: bidding_apply_company_total
var.value: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT supplier_id) bidding_apply_company_total FROM b2b_bidding.bid_announcements_register

var.name: bidding_apply_count_day
var.value: SELECT COUNT(1) bidding_apply_count_day FROM b2b_bidding.bid_announcements_register WHERE DATE(created_time)=DATE(NOW())

var.name: bidding_apply_count_total
var.value: SELECT COUNT(1) bidding_apply_count_total FROM b2b_bidding.bid_announcements_register

var.name: in_shortlist_company_day
var.value: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT r.supplier_id) in_shortlist_company_day FROM b2b_bidding.bid_announcements a inner join b2b_bidding.bid_announcements_register r on a.uid=r.bid_announcement_uid WHERE r.finalist_state=1 AND DATE(a.finalist_time)=DATE(NOW())

var.name: in_shortlist_company_total
var.value: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT r.supplier_id) in_shortlist_company_total FROM b2b_bidding.bid_announcements a inner join b2b_bidding.bid_announcements_register r on a.uid=r.bid_announcement_uid WHERE r.finalist_state=1

var.name: in_shortlist_count_day
var.value: SELECT COUNT(1) in_shortlist_count_day FROM b2b_bidding.bid_announcements a inner join b2b_bidding.bid_announcements_register r on a.uid=r.bid_announcement_uid WHERE r.finalist_state=1 AND DATE(a.finalist_time)=DATE(NOW())

var.name: in_shortlist_count_total
var.value: SELECT COUNT(1) in_shortlist_count_total FROM b2b_bidding.bid_announcements a inner join b2b_bidding.bid_announcements_register r on a.uid=r.bid_announcement_uid WHERE r.finalist_state=1
